Text.Page:
Those bloody jesters are still skulking about the catacombs.

I want you to cut those {@LinkCreature:22#26#toxic vampiric jesters} out of the academy.

When you're done, speak with Kendea for your payment.

Yahoo! Jesters are dead!

That'll keep the number of demons down, too! Good work!
If you haven't killed the {@LinkCreature:22#26#toxic vampiric jesters} and recovered their blood stones, we have nothing to discuss.
